bibl.title: Didymus the Blind: Commentary on Psalm 24 (23 LXX): Introduction, Translation and Commentary.
bibl.note: Didymus regards the Psalm as indicating the moral progress of the soul towards perfection. He interprets the second half of the Psalm as a reference to Christ's dwelling on earth and his ascension. - Avec résumé en anglais.
